title: LP keeps decaying even when I played and won ranked games...
body: Played like 6 games by now and my LP keeps decaying on my D5 main. Y tho

replies.body:
Make sure you're playing matches in the queue that is decaying. I couldn't tell which one it is that's decaying since this account is only level 6, but if don't want your rank to decay you have to play matches in that queue. 

For instance: If that D5 is your rank in duo, playing 3v3 won't stop the decay.
